flawed_nl_solution:
After going on vacation, Grandpa has 100 * 36 = <<100*36=36000>>36000 tomatoes.
So in his absence, 36000 - 36 = <<36000-36=35964>>35964 tomatoes have grown.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 36000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
